Posts.EditableText:
how do u create variables/flags in gamebook mode? I have 5.4 and i understood this was possible in 5.4 was I wrong? there's scripts to increase/decrease their value so there has to be a way to declare a variable in this mode.

Thanks

swrazor77
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: with "Set flag on", "Set flag off" or  "Set a variable or attribute"
